results.title: Combination of aqueous extracts of Curcuma longa (turmeric) and some calcium channel blockers synergistically improves CCl4-induced nephrotoxicity in albino rats.
results.text_hl: The 3 days daily administration of AECL alone or plus @CHEMICAL_Nifedipine @CHEMICAL_MESH:D009543 @@@nifedipine@@@ or @<m>CHEMICAL_Amlodipine</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017311 @@@amlodipine@@@ resulted in the attenuation of the @CHEMICAL_Carbon_Tetrachloride @CHEMICAL_MESH:D002251 @@@CCl4@@@-induced @<m>DISEASE_Kidney_Diseases</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D007674 @@@kidney injury@@@ with significantly decreased @CHEMICAL_Urea @CHEMICAL_MESH:D014508 @@@Urea@@@, @CHEMICAL_Creatinine @CHEMICAL_MESH:D003404 @@@Creatinine@@@, K+ and @CHEMICAL_3_4_Methylenedioxyamphetamine @CHEMICAL_MESH:D015104 @@@MDA@@@ levels and increased SOD activity (p<0.05. p<0.01).
